venue.name: The Kinsale Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Have you ever witnessed a no-hitter in person? Have you ever been to Fenway and sat next to a celebrity? This could be your chance! Craig (Native member and war hero) will be hosting this Natives Meetup where you could win a pair of Sox tickets that will be raffled off. You never know what will happen at a Sox game, but you need to be there to find out!

Among the items to be raffled:

- Pair of Red Sox Tickets (Game to be determined)

- Ted Williams Autographed 8x10" Color Photo w/COA

- Additional items of mysterious applicability

- 50/50 raffle (separate from raffle donation)

There is a $10 sensitively forced donation request to participate in the auction.

When you donate, you will receive a numbered wrist band, and numbers will be drawn that night. (sobriety not required to win)

100% of all money raised will support the Run to Home Base Charity.

While Craig's paper cuts do not qualify him as a Disabled Veteran, he is a military member who will honor other heroic veterans and help raise much needed funds for the Red Sox Foundation and Mass General.

You turned out with great support to help Mindy reach her goal - so lets keep the charity going!

Cheers!
item.how_to_find_us: There will be the after work crowd, then there will be us. You will spot us.
item.why: Win a Ted Williams autograph and Sox tickets to help support the Run To Home Base Charity!
item.name: Natives @ Kinsale!
